text: Hello! I am a Salesforce consultant that is looking to set up a custom integration between Salesforce and HubSpot. I realize there is an OOTB integration that can be performed between HubSpot  and Salesforce, however, this will not meet my clientâ€™s needs. If I was to implement a custom integration between the 2 systems, am I able to define a custom mapping between the HubSpot Contact Email field and custom Salesforce field? Natively, the SF Lead/Contact native Email fields map to the HubSpot Contact Email field. Instead of this, I want to map a custom field in Salesforce to the standard HubSpot Email field. Is this possible?
yup, you can do that since you will control the mapping.  You can map the email field to whatever you want in Salesforce
